name: Roasted Lamb Ribs
recipeIngredient: 1 whole breast of lamb, also called Denver cut or lamb riblets, with most of the fat still on see note

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 225 degrees. Sprinkle the meat with salt and pepper and place fat-side up in the roasting pan. Bake 3 to 4 hours, until the fat has rendered and browned and the meat is well done. Slice into ribs.
